title: Verizon Will Impose $20 Price Increase On Grandfathered Unlimited Data Subscribers Very Soon
text:
Verizon Will Impose $20 Price Increase On Grandfathered Unlimited Data Subscribers Very Soon 
Published By: AndroidPolice.com - Today 
Have an unlimited data plan on Verizon? Well, it's about to get more expensive. While the company hasn't actually offered unlimited smartpho...
